dcterms:creator: F. Yu
H. Chen
X. Wang
W. Xian
Y. Chen
F. Liu
V. Madhavan
T. Darrell
dcterms:description: The BDDV dataset includes more than 10k hours of road videos in city, rural, and highway environments in multiple cities, multiple weather conditions (sunny, rain, snow, etc.), and both day and night times. It also comes with real driver actions and GPS trajectory data which can be mapped to locations at each time step.
dcterms:title: Berkeley DeepDrive Video (BDDV)

dcterms:creator: A. Geiger
P. Lenz
C. Stiller
R. Urtasun
dcterms:description: The KITTI dataset provides a benchmark for various tasks in computer vision and robotics, including stereo, optical flow, visual odometry, and 3D object detection.
dcterms:title: KITTI

dcterms:creator: M. Cordts
M. Omran
S. Ramos

M. Enzweiler
R. Benenson
U. Franke
S. Roth
B. Schiele
dcterms:description: The Cityscapes dataset is designed for semantic urban scene understanding, providing high-quality pixel-level annotations for various tasks.
dcterms:title: Cityscape

dcterms:creator: E. Santana
G. Hotz
dcterms:description: The Comma.ai dataset is used for training self-driving car models, providing a large collection of driving data.
dcterms:title: Comma.ai

dcterms:creator: W. Maddern
G. Pascoe
C. Linegar
P. Newman
dcterms:description: The Oxford RobotCar Dataset consists of a year-long collection of driving data in Oxford, UK, capturing various weather conditions and times of day.
dcterms:title: Oxford RobotCar Dataset

dcterms:creator: C. Chen
A. Seff
A. Kornhauser
J. Xiao
dcterms:description: The Synthetic Princeton Torcs dataset is used for training and evaluating driving models in a simulated environment.
dcterms:title: Synthetic Princeton Torcs

dcterms:creator: S. R. Richter
V. Vineet
S. Roth
V. Koltun
dcterms:description: The GTA dataset is generated from video games to create realistic driving scenarios for training models.
dcterms:title: GTA
